name: MCP Ecosystem Mastery
description: Comprehensive guide for orchestrating multi-server MCP environments in the Antigravity Factory
best_practices: Always ground state-specific entities using Memory MCP before branching
Use RAG MCP for high-fidelity retrieval from structured library documents
Prefer Tavily MCP for real-time web intelligence and mapping
Standardize client connections using the MultiServerMCPClient pattern
anti_patterns: Hard-coding MCP server URLs in agent logic
Recursive tool loops without backtracking/re-evaluating state
Mixing local search and web search without clear priority
Using raw Playwright for content extraction when fetch_url is sufficient
